item.title: 花旗集团和巴克莱银行为高风险债务看到了 "堆积如山的资金
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的高级银行家们正在承销新的交易，他们认为，尽管预期经济会放缓，但投资者已经准备好抢购高风险债务。【原文：Top bankers from Citigroup Inc. and Barclays Plc who are underwriting new deals see investors ready to jump on risky debt, despite expectations of an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 侠盗猎车手 6》延期对每家游戏公司都有影响
item.description:
当 Rockstar 推迟发布这款备受期待的游戏时，一些游戏制造商松了一口气。而另一些则正在召开紧急会议。【原文：

When Rockstar pushed back the release of the highly anticipated title, some game makers breathed a sigh of relief. Others are holding emergency meetings.

】

item.title: 中美贸易战谈判即将开始，您需要了解什么？
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普升级与中国的关税战，对从中国进口的商品征收高额关税之后，世界最大贸易关系之一的未来岌岌可危。【原文：The future of one of the world’s biggest trading relationships hangs in the balance after US President Donald Trump escalated the tariff war with China by imposing steep duties on imports from the country.】

item.title: 南非 PIC 向鸡肉生产商提供资金以拯救鸟类
item.description: 南非最大的资金管理公司将向国有家禽生产商 Daybreak Foods 提供资金支持，此前曾有报道称该公司生产的家禽被饿死。【原文：South Africa’s biggest money manager will give financial support to state-owned poultry producer Daybreak Foods after reports of birds starving to death.】

item.title: CaixaBank 探索与孤星银行旗下 Novo Banco 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，CaixaBank SA 是探索收购 Novo Banco SA 的潜在收购者之一，这家由 Lone Star Funds 支持的葡萄牙贷款机构正在寻求首次公开募股。【原文：CaixaBank SA is among suitors exploring a potential acquisition of Novo Banco SA, the Portuguese lender backed by Lone Star Funds that is pursuing an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 破产的联邦承包商寻求快速出售以规避能源管理总局的威胁
item.description: 本周早些时候，一家联邦承包商在最新一轮政府裁员中申请破产，要求法官批准快速拍卖，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "政府效率部"（Department of Government Efficiency）正在构成威胁。【原文：A federal contractor that filed bankruptcy earlier this week during the latest round of government cutbacks asked a judge to approve a quick auction because of the ongoing threat of Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency.】

item.title: Stellantis 接近首席执行官人选，美国老板成为最大竞争者
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Stellantis NV 寻找新首席执行官的复杂过程已接近尾声，美洲公司的老板 Antonio Filosa 成为主要候选人。【原文：Stellantis NV is approaching the end of its complicated search for a new chief executive officer, with Americas boss Antonio Filosa emerging as the leading candidate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 期权交易员蜂拥下注美联储不会降息
item.description: 一种认为美联储今年不会降息的逆向赌注在期权市场大行其道。【原文：A contrarian wager that the Federal Reserve won’t cut interest rates this year is exploding in the options market.】

item.title: 疲软的就业报告提高了加拿大央行 6 月降息的可能性
item.description: 加拿大就业数据显示失业率开始上升，市场押注加拿大央行更有可能在 6 月份重启降息。【原文：Canadian jobs data point to the start of a period of rising unemployment, and markets are betting the Bank of Canada is more likely to restart interest rate cuts in June.】

item.title: 下一任首席执行官沃尔夫森以接近创纪录的价格出售 1240 万英镑股票
item.description: Next Plc 首席执行官西蒙-沃尔夫森（Simon Wolfson）出售了这家英国服装和家居用品零售商的 1240 万英镑（约合 1640 万美元）股票，该公司的指导性增长使股价创下历史新高。【原文：Next Plc Chief Executive Officer Simon Wolfson sold £12.4 million ($16.4 million) of shares in the British clothing and homewares retailer, as the company’s guidance boost sent the stock to a record high.】

item.title: 关税和通胀时需要考虑的五个因素
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 被视为避风港的抵押债券因利率狂飙而受到冲击
item.description: 多年来，资产经理和策略师一直将抵押贷款债券视为经济不景气时的避风港，但自唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布其关税闪电战以来，抵押贷款债券的表现一直不尽如人意。【原文：Asset managers and strategists have for years touted mortgage bonds as a haven when the economy stumbles, but the debt has underwhelmed since President Donald Trump announced his tariff blitz.】

item.title: 德国新任财政部长支持德国商业银行独立
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）周五表示，德国支持德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）成为一家独立的公司，这表明德国新政府不会减少对该银行可能被意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购的反对。【原文：Germany backs Commerzbank AG as an independent firm, Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said Friday, indicating that opposition to the bank’s potential takeover by UniCredit SpA won’t abate under the country’s new government.】

item.title: 智利称锂电交易告吹后中国企业愿意谈判
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司和青山控股集团股份有限公司重申有兴趣在智利建设锂电厂，这似乎与当地政府有关项目已被取消的言论相矛盾。【原文：BYD Co. and Tsingshan Holding Group Co. reiterated their interest in building lithium plants in Chile, appearing to contradict comments by local authorities that the projects had been scrapped.】

item.title: 沃勒发出解雇美联储官员不利于美国经济的信号
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）说，当货币政策制定者既要对选民负责，又要有职业保障时，经济稳定性就会得到改善。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said economic stability is improved when monetary policymakers are both accountable to voters and have job security.】

item.title: 美国农业经济开始受到特朗普关税的首轮冲击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的关税正在扰乱农作物贸易，推迟拖拉机的采购，并限制向美国进口化学用品。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariffs are upending crop trading, delaying tractor purchases and constraining imports of chemical supplies into the US.】

item.title: 穆迪称波士顿经济面临白宫政策挑战
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统威胁要剥夺波士顿主要部门的联邦援助，未来几年波士顿强大的财政状况将面临考验。【原文：Boston’s strong financial position will be tested in the coming years as President Donald Trump threatens to strip federal aid from the city’s key sectors.】

item.title: 微软精英团队不断努力挫败黑客攻击
item.description:
过去十年来，该软件公司已成为美国网络防御的支柱— ，而在特朗普执政期间，这一地位可能会变得更加复杂。【原文：

Over the past decade, the software company has become a pillar of US cyber defenses — a position that could become more complicated under Trump.

】

item.title: 首次公开募股失败后，CoreWeave 正在洽谈 15 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，在大幅缩减首次公开募股规模后，CoreWeave Inc.【原文：After a heavily scaled down initial public offering, CoreWeave Inc. is in discussions to raise about $1.5 billion in debt, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 集团称美英贸易协定对英国乙醇行业是灾难性的
item.description: 一个行业组织警告说，英国与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成的贸易协议将给英国乙醇行业带来 "灾难性 "后果，因为免关税进口威胁到当地生产商的生存。【原文：The UK trade deal struck with US President Donald Trump will have “disastrous” consequences for Britain’s ethanol sector as tariff-free imports threaten local producers’ existence, an industry group warned.】

item.title: 巴西航空公司 Gol 在增资提案提出后跌至历史最低点
item.description: Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的股价周五跌至历史最低点，因为这家巴西航空公司提出增资 192 亿雷亚尔（约合 34 亿美元），以求退出破产保护程序。【原文：Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA’s stock slumped to a record low on Friday after the Brazilian airline proposed a 19.2 billion reais ($3.4 billion) capital increase in its latest attempt to exit Chapter 11.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称并非所有企业都能因关税而提价
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，企业不一定能通过提高价格来抵消关税成本，他警告说，消费者在经历多年通胀后的承受能力有限。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said it’s not a given that companies can raise their prices to offset the cost of tariffs, warning that consumers’ tolerance after years of inflation is only so high.】

item.title: 太阳能充斥电网，法国电价跌至零以下
item.description: 由于本周末太阳能发电量将压倒电网，法国日前电力自去年 7 月以来首次跌破零点。【原文：French day-ahead power tumbled below zero for the first time since July last year as solar generation this weekend is set to overwhelm the grid.】

item.title: 美国股市开盘上涨，投资者期待中国会谈
item.description: 美国股市周五开盘走高，交易商权衡了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的言论，他表示对中国征收 80% 的关税似乎是正确的，而此时两国之间的谈判正定于周六开始。【原文：US stocks opened higher Friday as traders weighed comments from President Donald Trump suggesting that an 80% tariff on China seemed right, just as negotiations between the two countries are set to begin on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普的首个贸易协定让人对交易的艺术略知一二
item.description: 对于正在思考如何与唐纳德-特朗普谈判的全球领导人来说，美国总统与英国签订的就职协议提供了一些线索，说明他准备让步多少。【原文：For global leaders puzzling over how to negotiate with Donald Trump, the US president’s inaugural pact with the UK offers a few clues on how much ground he’s prepared to give.】

item.title: 永明资产管理和美国业绩强劲，超出预期
item.description: 在资产管理部门的推动下，永明金融公司第一季度业绩超出分析师预期。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc. beat analyst expectations in the first quarter, fueled by its asset management segment.】

item.title: 印度证券监管机构推行高于预期的持仓限额
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，印度证券监管机构的一个小组建议采用一种新的方法来计算未平仓期权和期货的价值，并提高持仓限额。【原文：A panel of India’s securities regulator has recommended a new way of calculating the value of options and futures outstanding and increasing position limits, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 匈牙利反对欧盟制裁卢克石油迪拜分公司的提议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，匈牙利对欧盟制裁俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在迪拜的贸易公司 Litasco Middle East DMCC 的提议表示反对。【原文：Hungary raised objections to a European Union proposal to sanction Litasco Middle East DMCC, a Dubai-based trading unit of Russian oil giant Lukoil PJSC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷阿尔巴内西公用事业公司在未支付债券后与债权人接洽
item.description: 阿根廷公用事业公司阿尔巴内西集团（Grupo Albanesi）的两家子公司在六个月前发行的美元债券未获偿付后，向债权人伸出了援手。【原文：Two subsidiaries of Argentina’s utility Grupo Albanesi have reached out to creditors after missing a payment on dollar bonds it issued just six months ago.】
